titles.title: O Could I Speak The Matchless Worth

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O could I speak the matchless worth, newline O could I sound the glories forth, newline Which in my Savior shine? newline I'd sing His glorious righteousness newline And magnify the wondrous grace newline Which made salvation mine; newline Which made salvation mine.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I'd sing the precious blood He spilt, newline My ransom from the dreadful guilt newline Of sin, and wrath divine; newline I'd sing His glorious righteousness, newline In which all perfect, heavenly dress, newline My soul shall ever shine; newline My soul shall ever shine.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I'd sing the characters He bears newline And all the forms of love He wears, newline Exalted on His throne; newline In loftiest songs of sweetest praise, newline I would to everlasting days, newline Make all His glories known; newline Make all His glories known.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Soon the delightful day will come, newline When my dear Lord will bring me home newline And I shall see His face; newline Then with my Savior brother friend, newline A blest eternity I'll spend, newline Triumphant in His grace; newline Triumphant in His grace. newline Amen.
